Summary: wonderful, repulsive, insulting to the relationship between man and women
divs: sighting detailsdear sir madam my name is oriel stainton and i hail from north island, new zealand i believe i am being harrassed by an entity, that fits your desription as a ufo or entity or creature, i was wondering if you could investigate the evidence i have collected (over a period) and give me your point of view on these strange cicumstances. i am assurred you have children we all do, in your presence just ask yourself "would you want this thing meddling and moving around your defenceless children, because i dont want it near me, the creature appeared in my life the day my father passed away (21 june 2006) it has been here eversince, please bring your attention to attachment labelled paranormal investigation 2 this article i got of the internet it depicts a strange storm that occured over new zealand the day my father died and this creature appeared, what it bassically states is that when the storm occured there was an enigmatic (mysterious) object hovering over new zealand like a supernova creating unusual gamma rays burst that pulsated over the earth in all directions, wrecking havoc the effects were felt half a world away, and the storm left scientists baffled, i swear black and blue when that storm occurred i could see the creature flying thru the sky drawing fantastical murals and wreaking havoc, it was skitzing out i tell you attacking me and everbody around me it attacked me it kept spitting and screaming at me when it spat you can feel it it howled "who are you bi***" "this is my house" "this is my house" it proclaimed to be a king and god, it scared the shit out of me i ended up in a pshciatrict unit 3 weeks after my father passed away the day he died i couldn't eat sleep when i arrived at hospital i was a skeletor, anyways inspect the photographs i have shown them to a paranormal investigator and he mentioned to me matrixing, the only thing with that is not only do i see the pictures in the clouds, it draws pictures on walls in puddles of water any surface really, and like it goes behind people and you can see bright lights behind them like an aura sometimes bright pink sometimes bright white sometimes purple its scary, im too scared to look in the mirror when i brush my teeth at night because there it is the aura behind you, i know you probably think "what a load of hogswash, who is this maddy" but please be assured i would never lie to children or anyone for a matter of fact, two words to describe this creatures likeness blind rage the attachment labelled paranormal pics top photo where i put the pen mark can you see the mans face then behind him looks like animals fighting bottom photo looks like a man face (side view) with something covering his mouth that just my opinion the person taking the strange photos thank you for your time\awaiting your reply with kindest regards god bless you and your work sincerely oriel stainton
trends: There have been 51 other sightings in Auckland
There were no other sightings in Auckland on or around June 21st 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Shape: Cross, Egg, Fireball, Flash, Star-like, Unknown
